details.title: The ELDORA/ASTRAIA airborne Doppler weather radar: results from recent field tests
details.abstract: The ELDORA/ASTRAIA airborne Doppler weather radar was recently placed in service by US and French atmospheric sciences research laboratories. The ELDORA/ASTRAIA radar is designed to provide high resolution measurements of the air motion and rainfall characteristics of atmospheric storms which are too large, remote or fast-moving to be adequately observed by ground-based radars. This paper discusses the measurement requirements and the design goals of the radar and presents sample measurements from a recent weather research field program
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
